page.title: 06COMPTON DUNDON VICARAGE
page.content: Mr.Adams (a lay reader) lives in the{ {vicarage }and has lived there for 8 years .He has lived in Compton for 19 years. He lives in one of the few victorian houses in the village.Since he's lived there he has made a number of changes to his house: he has put in central heating,he has re-done his roof and converted a room back into a bathroom. Mr. Adams moved to this area to take up a teaching appointment at Millfield School.During the last number of years the{village}has grown in size and the population increased. Many of the people who live there are old village families.Enough jobs can be found in a reasonable driving area to keep the people in the village. Today, the{congregation}is fairly small ( approx.25), however many people attend the main festivals such as Christmas and the Harvest.
